Summary: Took pictures of sky, turned up on one pic.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Wilton Manors
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsover the past couple of weeks i have begun taking pictures @ around or before 8pm to put on facebook. last night i went out to take a few shots which are generally done of the western sky. as i looked to the south, the colors of the sky were so beautiful and it was about to rain (again), so i started taking shots one after another. it started to shower so i went in to take a look and choose a pic for facebook. that is when i noticed the strange looking white spot on one of the pictures. it looke so out of place and i had not noticed it as i looked through the lens. the object looks white against a purple\pink\smoky grey sky and it is triangular shaped although from the distance that it was taken there are no sharp looking edges. the moment that i saw it on my camera, i immediatelty uploaded to my computer to get a closer look at it and it looks extremely odd. all of the pictures were taken in the same direction of the sky one after the other. i called my husband to come in to take a look and tell me if he could explain what he thought it might me...he could not. i have to say that i was not only surprised at what is in the picture, but kind of excited too.
